GapFillInput.Title: and and but
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type and or but into each gap to complete the sentences.

Content.Question:
1. We watched the football but we didn’t play.
2. Joy and Pete went to the beach and relaxed.
3. She stayed in a hotel but she didn’t go to the hotel pool.
4. My mother and I went shopping but we didn’t buy anything.
5. I went to the mountains and swam in the lake.
6. Johannes went to a restaurant and met his friend.
7. I really liked Natalie but we argued a lot.
8. Jim and Ina went to the ticket office and bought their tickets for the train.
9. We can play basketball but we can’t play football.
10. My husband and I visited lots of art galleries and ate in some nice restaurants.
